text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Cholesterol testing" includes collecting a test specimen, testing to detect the amount of cholesterol in an individual's blood, and the reporting of test results.

"Permit" means a permit issued by the Secretary to a person who:
Offers to provide, with or without charge, a test to detect the amount of cholesterol in an individual's blood; and
Conducts the test outside a permanently located medical laboratory issued a permit or excepted from a permit under Subtitle 2 of this title.
